# Bio

I am a PhD student and Associate Lecturer in the Computer and Information Sciences Department at Northumbria University who is a member of the Northumbria Social Computing research group. I am currently conducting interdisciplinary research around misinformation and family communications, and I am also interested in research surrounding digital learning tools.

## Updates
{{< fa trophy >}} I have recently been awarded fellowship of the Higher Education Academy (HEA).

{{< fa book-reader >}} I recently became an Associate Chair (AC) for the DIS'24 Work in Progress and Provocations track.

{{< fa university >}} I recently gave a talk as part of the NorSC Lab Seminar Series titled: Misinformation, communication, and challenges: how technology can be used to support misinformation correction within UK family networks?
